page.title: 05ST JAMES C.E., FORDHOUSES
page.content: When we arived at the church we met the vicar.His name was Mr Taylor and he came from St James Church. We went into the lounge to aske him some questions. They have clubs at the church.They have got Brownies and they used to have Sunday school.They don,t do it any more because not enough children come toit. They have a Guide group and mothers and toddlers club.There,s an explorer group 7-11 years old and pathguiders 11-14 years old.They have services on Sundays.They have Parade service at 10.30 and they have Coummuinion at 6.30.They have got a library because at the end of the services every body dosn,t go in a hurry so they read them at the end.The vicar goes to visit the sick people and visit the elderly people.
